        public static <T> T getFromCurrentPath(javax.servlet.jsp.PageContext pageContext,

        A helper method that returns a model of a page
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of object to be returned
        Parameters:
        pageContext - allows to access resource path, request context and injector instance
        type - of model that should be created
        Returns:
        a model of type T of the page indicated by pageContext

                                       Class<T> type,

        A helper method that returns a model of a page
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of object to be returned
        Parameters:
        pageContext - allows to access resource path, request context and injector instance
        type - of model that should be created
        appName - - name of application needed to find a proper injector in multi-app environment
        Returns:
        a model of type T of the page indicated by pageContext
